titleStmt.title: SII 7.467: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 467. (A.R. No. 253 of 1901). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . vīramey tuṇaiyā
kavum tiyākame Aṇiyākavuñ
ceṅko locci karuṅkali kaṭi
n=tu kūṭalcaṅkamat tāhavamalla
ṉai Añcuvittu vikkaylaṉaiyuñciṅkaṇa
ṉaiyu muṭaipuṟaṅkaṇṭu maṟṟavar mātevi
yaroṭu vastuvaāhaṉaṅ kaikkoṇṭu Ira
ṇṭāmicaiyuṅ kuṟitta kaḷattu Āhavamallanai
Añcuvittu veṅkaināṭu miṭṭukkoṇṭu tan
nuṭaṉpiṟanta munṉavar virata muṭittu vijaiyaciṅkācanattu
Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷina kovirājakecari
panmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīvīrarājentradevarkku yāṇṭu
Aiñcāvatu kaḷattūrkkoṭṭattut taniyūr śrīmaturā
ntakaccaruppetimaṅkalattut tenpiṭākai tiruvacci
ṟupākkam Āṭcikoṇṭaruḷiṉa mahādevar devatāna
m tiruvacciṟupākkam tarampeṟṟa nirnilam pāṭakam Eṇ
pattonṟiṉāl maturān=takatevaṉ marakkālāl kāṇi
kkaṭaṉ nellu toḷḷāyirattorupatteṇ
kalamum kollainilam pāṭakam Eṇpatiṉāl pā
ṭakam Oṉṟukku nellu tūṇiyāka nellu I
rupattaṟukalaṉe Irutūṇiyum Āka nellu toḷ
ḷāyirattu nāṟpattunāṟkalane Irutūṇiyum ti
ruvacciṟupākkamuṭaiyarkku nellu toḷāyira
t torupattunāṟ kalane Irutūṇiyum nipan=tañcey
tu śrīkayilāsam Uṭaiyār koyilil kal veṭṭiṉa
paṭi nipan=tañcelvatākavum nikki śrīmūlastānamuṭai
ya Āṭcikoṇṭārkku nellu muppatinkalamum Iv
vūr sabhaiyār koṇṭu varu
kiṟa velikkācum Iṟai
yilikkācum nirvilai
kkācum paṉmaipaṇṭa
veṭṭiyum viraceṣai
yum Ukavaipoṉnu
mk kācicipoṉnum
mutalecilavum vaṇ
ṇakūliyum mīṉppā
ṭṭamum kiḻiṟaiyum
kālaḷavukūliyum kāval
ccevakamum Uṭpaṭṭa
Antarāyaṅkaḷum meṟpukutakkaṭava Antarāya
mum kammāḷamakaḻmaiyum taṟiyiṟaiyum Ā
ḷvariyum tiruveḻiccikkuṭimaiykaḷum
kūttikālum melvari mutalāy varuṅ kaṭamai
kaḷum Uḷḷiṭṭa kaṭamaikaḷ ḷellām tiruvacciṟu
pākkattu śrīmulastānattu Āṭcikoṇṭaruḷiya mā
devarkku veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukku Uṭalāka Ivvūril
pārkkiṟa Atikāriyaḷ maṇṇaikoṇṭacoḻapallavarai
yar tiruttina nilam dekṣaṇaāmurttiviḷākattāl vanta ka
ṭamaiyum Ittevarkku tiruvamur tuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukku
yāṇṭu Añcāvatumutal cantrātittavaṟ Iṟaiyiliyākak kuṭuttom peruṅkuṟi sabhai
yom paṇittār viracoḻaccerik kārampicceṭṭu nārāyaṇaperumbhaṭṭar paṇikka paṇi
yāl madhyastan taṟpparamporuḷin neḻuttu . kuṇṭūr puruṣottamabhaṭṭa Atirātra
yāji Eḻuttu Ātraiya Udayadivākarasarvvādittan Eḻuttu . kārampicceṭṭu nāraāya
ṇabhaṭṭan Eḻuttu . kuñcappavvil pūti viṣṇuvāṉa maturān=takabrahmappalla
varaiyan Eḻuttu .

On another piece are found the following:
peruṅ
kuṟi sa
bhai⌈
yom E
ḻuttu
nammūr
Digital edition of SII 7.467 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
